text: United Alive in Madrid is a live album released in 2019 by the German power metal band Helloween. The recordings took place during the band's Pumpkins United World Tour (2017–2018), with former members Michael Kiske and Kai Hansen joining Helloween's line-up. The main concert was recorded on 9 December 2017 in Madrid, Spain and the bonus tracks in Chile, Brazil, Czech Republic and Germany. The video release United Alive came out on the same day as the live albumhttp://www.metal- temple.com/site/news/view/general_news/helloween-release-1st.htm and contained concert footage filmed during 2017 in Spain and Brazil and during 2018 in Wacken Open Air Festival (Germany).
